ygData.subject: RE: trade question
ygData.msgSnippet: The shard works great for me in Lower Guk, in Sol B though the kobolds have very high fire resist and it only sticks one in four hits. Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
The shard works great for me in Lower Guk, in Sol B though the kobolds have
very high fire resist and it only sticks one in four hits.

Rokenn


>From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] trade question
>Date: Thu, 2 Dec 1999 11:46:59 -0600
>
>That's nice, but I've been camping the predator for weeks and haven't got a
>shard and I can't seem to find anyone on Prexus willing to sell or trade
>one. Additionally, I'm told that above 30 it starts to get resisted A LOT
>and being of the 29th song... So given the shard seems out of the
>question:
>Is a obsidian scimitar a good trade for a silvery war axe or should I hold
>out for something better?
>
>Taneran Dreamweaver
><Clan Jax>
>Bard of the 29th song
>Prexus
